nml_option.name: config_use_paraview_catalyst
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member paraview_catalyst is called.

nml_option.name: config_paraview_catalyst_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_paraview_catalyst_compute_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

package.name: paraview_catalyst
package.description: This package includes variables required for the paraview_catalyst analysis member.
